result.reason: Common recurring issue (refs #983, #309, #230) with no diagnostic tooling; enhanced logging and graceful degradation would significantly improve field troubleshooting.
result.approach: Add verbose logging to SettingsLoader.LoadSettings() around each Properties.*.Default access (675 accesses across 74 files), wrap ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration() in SettingsFileInfo with detailed exception logging, add try-catch-fallback in PortableSettingsProvider._rootDocument getter (currently swallows exceptions at line 68-72), and enhance StartupDataLogger.LogSettingsData() to validate user.config existence/readability before Settings access; optionally implement graceful degradation to default values when user.config is corrupt.
